violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons are nearby without proper badges.
violations.recommendation: Check badge colors and ensure only authorized persons are present.

violations.description: Attended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
All persons in work zones must wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all workers have the correct PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with all security rules. Please investigate the cause and take appropriate action.
